greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 2n-bead balanced binary necklaces which are equivalent to their reverse, but not equivalent to their complement and reversed complement.
comment: The number of 2n-bead balanced binary necklaces equivalent to their reverse is A128014(n) and those equivalent to their reverse, complement and reversed complement is A045674(n). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 28 2017
link: Index entries for sequences related to necklaces
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
